Upcoming Events

Beyond participating in the official race we will be taking part in several other events to raise awareness including park & beach cleanupsl local school events; charity fundraising galas and much more! You can find out more about past events on our blog.

Our events page is coming soon, but in the mean time, we'd love to hear from you if you would be intersted in joining us at any of these events.
